name: Wanderlith
description:
Wanderlith is a game produced for #WeeklyGameJam 65.

In Wanderlith you play as a lith, wandering.  Whereto does a lith wander?  Well, have you ever seen a rock in a strange place or shape and wondered how on earth that could have gotten like that?  Well, wonder no more, for I know, it wandered.

Wanderlith can be played with either Mouse+Keyboard or Xbox-compatible controller

Controls

  • Click/Bumper Left or Right  to tilt that side up, and Drag/Joystick to rotate
  • R/B Button to Reset
  • C/Select to clear debris (in case it starts to get ridiculous)
  • S/Start to skip level (in case you're just curious and have an underdeveloped sense of adventure)
